description: Movavi provides several applications for working with videos, including Video Editor and Slideshow Maker. These programs are also available with the Video Suite and all use the MEP format (now, the MEPX format).

When saving a project, the Movavi application would store the contents as an MEP file. After saving the project, you could close it, re-open it, and make more edits. To create an MEP file with Video Editor or Video Suite, select File â†’ Save Project .
When you are done editing your video project, you can export it to various video formats, including .MP4 and .AVI . To export an MEP file, select Export .
